### Added
- Add `SkipCRDs` to `ChartSpecConfig` and `AppSpecConfig`.
- Add AWS CNI annotation to configure `WARM_IP_TARGET` and `MINIMUM_IP_TARGET`.
### Fixed
- Fix name for `AppCatalogEntry` example.
